patthana15.90:4.1: Araṇaṃ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.90:5.1: Saraṇaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.90:5.2: Araṇaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.90:5.3: Saraṇaṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca araṇaṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #3
patthana15.90:6.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, aññamaññe ekaṃ … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.90:8.1: Araṇaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. #1
patthana15.90:9.1: Saraṇaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana15.90:10.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … nakamme ekaṃ … pe … naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge ekaṃ … pe … navippayutte ekaṃ … pe … novigate tīṇi.
patthana15.90:12.1: Saraṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo nasaraṇassa naanidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana15.90:13.1: Araṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo nasaraṇassa naanidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana15.90:14.1: Hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve, sahajāte nissaye tīṇi, pacchājāte kamme dve, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre indriye jhāne magge vippayutte dve … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.90:15.1: Saraṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo nasaraṇassa naanidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo, pacchājātapaccayena paccayo, kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana15.90:16.1: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … noavigate tīṇi.
